Module 4 Docs documentation
===========================

This project contains a Flask web app and ETL pipeline for scraping, cleaning,
loading, and querying admissions survey data. Documentation covers setup,
architecture, API reference, and testing.

.. toctree::
   :caption: Contents

   overview
   architecture
   api
   testing
